item.title: A cabinet for the ANT CNC

description.p: I made some updates to my Varnerized ANT CNC. I'm pretty happy with how this looks, sits on a table, and functions. It's finally become a tool I can just setup and use, rather than one I have to tweak with constantly to get decent results.

item.title: Using an Arduino Nano to burn Arduino Bootloaders

description.p: Here's a KiCad project for Using an Arduino Nano as an Arduino ISP.

For the last few years I've been remiss in keeping a personal blog that didn't suck. Lately I've had need (or desire?) to post some longer-form project info, or re-establish a web presence for things that don't fit nicely into the buckets served by social media.
